message: As might be expected the book costs twice as much in the U.K... and hasn't been released yet.

Hardcover: $14.13, Used: $33.60 (1 available). Hmm. And the audio version costs more than the (new) hardcover. This IS a fascinating book.

"The author was afforded an opportunity to observe the company’s operations, development, culture and advertising model from within the infrastructure for two years with full managerial cooperation. From there, he performed hundreds of interviews..."
